Would be mistake to pursue “deal” with Xi Jinping at G20

Spread the word: open enrollment for the Affordable Care Act is happening right now! You have until December 15 to get covered, unless you live in a state that has an extension (Californians, you have until January 15). Sign up today at http://healthcare.gov.

Congratulations to the team at @NASA for a successful #MarsLanding & giving all Americans something to be very proud of. https://twitter.com/nasa/status/1067145015216861184 QT @NASA Our @NASAInSight spacecraft stuck the #MarsLanding!

Its new home is Elysium Planitia, a still, flat region where it’s set to study seismic waves and heat deep below the surface of the Red Planet for a planned two-year mission. RT @ASlavitt It’s cyber-Monday. If you’re uninsured or know someone who is, most can get covered for under $75/month, many at no premium.

In most states, you need to buy before December 15.

Advertising was cut so if you’re inclined, please help circulate.

http://Www.healthcare.gov https://twitter.com/getuscovered/status/1066830486234939393 QT @GetUSCovered On http://Healthcare.gov, most people can find plans for $50 to $100 per month AND most people qualify for help covering costs.

Find a 2019 plan that fits your budget and needs at http://HealthCare.gov. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ds4kqBGVAAADL4v.jpg

Its new home is Elysium Planitia, a still, flat region where it’s set to study seismic waves and heat deep below the surface of the Red Planet for a planned two-year mission. Learn more: /insight/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ds9CuuqVAAEejFl.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1067144948238045190/vid/320x180/oh-S1JbqFXFpQu9_.mp4?tag=8

This is another milestone that will help us better understand Mars before placing American boots on the surface of the Red Planet. https://twitter.com/NASAInSight/status/1067147649386598400 QT @NASAInSight My first picture on #Mars! My lens cover isn’t off yet, but I just had to show you a first look at my new home. More status updates:
https://go.nasa.gov/InSightStatus #MarsLanding http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ds9FEc_U0AguaqB.jpg

America should always be a nation that offers asylum to those fleeing oppression or tyranny

But asylum isn’t a right, it’s generosity

It’s wrong for those seeking generosity to complain it’s taking too long & indefensible for any of them to protest by throwing rocks & bottles

RT @SenBooker The Trump Administration wants to nominate a man named Thomas Farr for a lifetime appointment to a U.S. District Court. This is a man who has engaged in systemic voter suppression throughout his legal career. 

We must stop his nomination.
#StopHateStopFarr http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DfCGDTNXcAIBKjQ.jpg

The Senate is voting this week on federal judiciary nominee Thomas Farr. I strongly oppose his nomination because of his anti-voting rights and anti-workers rights record.  We're one Republican vote short of stopping his nomination. Call your Senators now.

This week I will go to the floor of the Senate to try to stop a war that has led to the deaths of many thousands of civilians, mass starvation and one of the greatest humanitarian crises in the world.

The US Senate must vote to end our role in Saudi Arabia’s war in Yemen. https://twitter.com/ajplus/status/1065289574438617088 QT @ajplus An estimated 85,000 Yemeni children may have died from starvation or disease since war began in 2015, says @save_children.

The UN says more than 1.3 million children have suffered from severe acute malnutrition. Up to 14 million people in Yemen are currently at risk of famine. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dsip3jrWsAEj9oW.jpg
#TeamPelosi http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ds-ffG1U0AANRKr.jpg

California has been tackling the threat of climate change head-on. We know that you can lead the fight against climate change and have a strong economy at the same time. If this Administration won’t step up to create a cleaner, greener future, state and local governments must.

The fight @unitehere and the Marriott hotel workers are waging in Hawaii and California and the courage they’re showing is exactly the fight that must be waged in every state in this country. One job should be enough for people to live with dignity. https://twitter.com/unitehere/status/1066421381867409409 QT @unitehere We’ve been on strike for over 50 days - fighting for jobs that are enough to live in the cities where we work, raise a family, and retire with dignity. We’re united in our fight, and stronger because of it. We won’t stop until we win.  #1job #MarriottStrike http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsywmD_WwAEcnJ_.jpg
